Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulate a deck of cards.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Create a Deck of 52 Card objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card deal()
      Deal the Deck's top Card object.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Return an indicator of whether or not the Deck is empty.
      void putBack(Card card)
      Put back a Card at the bottom of the Deck.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffle the Deck.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Create a Deck of 52 Card objects. Shuffle these objects.

    • Method Detail

      • deal

        public Card deal()
        Deal the Deck's top Card object.
        Returns:
        the Card object at the top of the Deck

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Return an indicator of whether or not the Deck is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the Deck contains no Card objects; otherwise, false

      • putBack

        public void putBack(Card card)
        Put back a Card at the bottom of the Deck.
        Parameters:
        card - Card object being put back

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffle the Deck.
